name: blocked_workflow_reporting_and_escalation
text:
🚦 = blockage_detector_agent
📝 = WriteBlockReportTool
📨 = escalation_agent
🚦 >> blockage_detector_agent(current_task=current_task, completed_tasks=completed_tasks) = ❗
📝 >> WriteBlockReportTool(completed_tasks=completed_tasks, current_task=current_task, explanation=❗, blocked_reason=❗) = 📄
📨 >> escalation_agent(block_report=📄) = 📧
📧 ==>
